channel.title: Thousand Springs Scenic Byway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Thousand Springs Scenic Byway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-93 North at US-30/Bus. US-93
item.description: US-93 North at US-30/Bus. US-93 in Twin Falls County. Merge right for Bus. US-93 North/US-30 East to Twin Falls City Center. Continue under overpass for US-93 north to Twin Falls and Sun Valley and for US-30 west to Filer. US-30 is part of the Thousand Springs Scenic Byway.

item.title: US-30 West/BL-84 - Thousand Springs Scenic Byway
